title: ConvertTransformFile
description: Utility to read in a transform file (presumed to be in binary format) and output it in various formats. Default output is legacy human-readable text format. Without any options, the output filename extension must be .txt or .tfm to signify a text-formatted transform file.

input_transform_file.title: Input Transform File
input_transform_file.description: Path to the input transform file.

output_transform_file.title: Output Transform File
output_transform_file.description: Path for the output transform file.

matrix.title: Matrix
matrix.description: Output only the transform matrix to a text file, one row per line with space-delimited values. Only works for specific transform types.

homogeneous_matrix.title: Homogeneous Matrix
homogeneous_matrix.description: Output an N+1 square homogeneous matrix from the transform matrix and offset. Only works for specific transform types.

RAS.title: RAS Coordinate System
RAS.description: Convert the output into the RAS coordinate system if combined with 'matrix' or 'homogeneousMatrix'.

convert_to_affine_type.title: Convert to Affine Type
convert_to_affine_type.description: Convert the input transform type to AffineTransform and output again as a binary transform file.
